QuestData.Title: Make Yourself Useful
QuestData.Description: Gobbles vill be sorely missed, but zhe mission must not suffer.$b$bPerhaps zhere is somezhink you can do to redeem yourself.$b$bTake vone of zhe uniforms you recovered. Vhile vearink it, my vorkers vill not behave so... aggressively.$b$bLately, zheir morale has been a bit lackink. Some of zhe vorkers are refusing to perform zheir labors.$b$bAuch, zhe audacity!$b$bFind zhese lazy imbeciles and convince zhem zhat zhey must get to vork... or else!
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Schnottz wants you to persuade 6 Slacking Laborers to get to work.
QuestData.RewardText: Vell done, $c.$b$bZhere may be hope for you yet.
